Interesting vaccine efficacy data from Greece, calculating a total of 8,413 averted covid deaths as of October (total deaths were 15,447). Calculations show that a further 1,200 could have been averted if vaccine coverage for over 50 were 95%.

https://t.co/9P0WJCkaRJ

@irene_karras @AdrianaLaGrange The Grade 12s have had every year of their high school experience significantly disprupted by covid. Most of their last semester of Gr. 10 online, constant interruptions and online for at least two long stretches of Gr. 11, and many disruptions in Gr. 12 as they try to catch up.

I'm really hoping @AdrianaLaGrange  announces diplomas optional again this year. Grade 12s have not had a normal HS experience & are already stressed making up lost time. If not, I foresee a lot upgrading online next year. Not ideal. Have mercy on the children. #abed #ableg
